name: Astro Bugz: Revenge
overview: Battle against bugz invasion in a sci-fi marble popper arcade. Astro Bugz is an action-puzzle game with a retro vibe. Protect our solar system from astro-bugz and blast them by matching 3 or more bugz. Pick up valuable power-ups and activate them to annihilate the incoming invaders. Flip to the other side in Revenge mode and play the bugz. Test your skills against your friends by playing Co-Op or Versus mode. This action packed game mechanic will surely get you addicted. Features • 1 or 2 players • Versus and Co-Op mode • 5 Boss Battles • Valuable power-ups • 3 levels of difficulty • Fight over 5 planets • 100 challenging levels • 3 unique game modes • High score table
